resources.string: A Clock with sec - min - hour hands

i applied in this sample basics of drawing in canvas using some math, it is redraw only once every second, and as you see, it is kinda accurate with a little milliseconds delay, this bug can be fixed to make the hour completely accurate but for now that\'s fine

applying canvas animations to draw each item from the board, one issue i ignored is that i make each tic or tac in a separated box, and this will lead to simple performance issue according to recomposition in each tip, another simple problem is that is i set the touch event by listening to press instead of release, i think it must be on release, but it was more difficult than i expected, so i leaved it as it is, i don\'t think there is need to show results since the purpose is canvas itself
